hero.title: Help & Support Center
hero.subtitle: Find answers to your questions or get in touch with our support team for personalized assistance

faqs.question: How do I set up a new exam?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the Exam Management section, click 'Create New Exam', and follow the step-by-step wizard to configure your exam settings, questions, and proctoring options.

faqs.question: What browsers are supported for exam taking?
faqs.answer: Procto supports the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. For the best experience, we recommend using Chrome with camera and microphone permissions enabled.

faqs.question: How does the proctoring system work?
faqs.answer: Our AI-powered proctoring system monitors video feeds, audio, and screen activity in real-time. It detects suspicious behavior and flags potential violations for review by administrators.

faqs.question: Can students take exams on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Currently, exams can only be taken on desktop or laptop computers with webcam access. Mobile devices are not supported for security and monitoring purposes.

faqs.question: How long are exam recordings stored?
faqs.answer: Exam recordings are stored for 90 days by default, but this can be configured in the system settings. After the retention period, recordings are automatically deleted.

supportTicket.title: Submit Support Ticket
supportTicket.responseTime: Our support team typically responds within 2-4 hours during business hours.
